data.name: After Corruption
data.detailed_description:
After Corruption is a retro survival horror game inspired by the early days of PSX.

A extra-dimensional virus has infected, and destroyed the known world. You play as an agent of an organization created to study the breach and try to restore the world to a stable place

- third person/fixed camera
- 7 environment types to explore
- procedurally generated levels
- random puzzles
- weird/gross/horrifying bosses
- cheesy cutscenes
- moving while aiming
- old-school tank controls
- nostalgic vertex jiggle
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A retro survival horror game where you dive into fragmented procedural levels to try and save the world from the corruption that destroyed it

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains blood, monster, gun/weapon use
